unnormalised: Hey everyone! Any news on Bumrah's back? Hope he's recovering well – the World Cup needs him! Heard Jadeja might be out for a bit too. Wishing both a speedy recovery, like a DDLJ-style comeback! Get well soon, heroes! Did AIIMS doctors give an update? We need those wickets and that batting power. Come on, Team India!
